nodes.text: The Zybahhod system was a star system that was located within the Herios sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Slice. It was home to the sentient Zybahhod Yenyoni species.
The Zybahhod system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square T-15.
